link_desc:
Description.

Template to check if the Windows Firewall (per Profile) is enabled.

The plugin will check 3 Firewall profiles.

- Domain

- Private (or Home)

- Public

Zip file containing.

- zbx-winfirewall.exe

- zbx-winfirewall.xml (Zabbix template)

- zbx-winfirewall.au3 (Source Code)

- zbx-firewall.png (BPMN model)

- zbx-firewall.svg (BPMN model)

- zbx-firewall.bpmn (BPMN model)

- settings.ini (Autogenerated after first run)

- logs\zbx-winfirewall.log (Autogenerated after first run)

Tested with:

- Zabbix 3.0

- Windows 2008r2

- Windows 2012r2

Installation.

== On the server ==

1. Upload the template

2. Edit the key "Check Firewall" to the path where "zbx-winfirewall.exe" is located.

3. Create/Edit triggers for your needs.

== On the client ==

1. Copy "zbx-winfirewall.exe"and "settings.ini" to directory "C:\Zabbix\plugins\zbx-winfirewall"

Edit settings.ini:

2. SENDER to the path of your zabbix_sender.exe

3. CONFIG to the path of your zabbix_agentd.win.conf

4. Make sure that "EnableRemoteCommand=1" is enabled in your "zabbix_agent.win.conf"
author: L. Rutten (bitfinity.nl)
